text: The Trans-Siberian Orchestra is an American progressive rock group. They were founded around 1996. They became popular around 1999. This was when they began touring with their second studio album, The Christmas Attic. Both Billboard Magazine and Pollstar ranked them as one of the top ticket-selling groups in the first decade of the new millennium. ==References== Category:American rock bands Category:1996 establishments in the United States
title: Trans-Siberian Orchestra
